attributes.action: Award Mo Farah with a Knighthood to reward his contribution to UK sport.
attributes.background: Mo's achievements in athletics deserve to be recognised by the UK Government. This decision falls at the door of Number 10 and we call on the Prime Minister Theresa May to award a Knighthood to Mo Farah on his return from the Rio Olympics.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
